title: In computing technology, what is the main purpose for using a firewall? - Quora

response.answer_text: A firewall monitors the incoming and the outgoing traffic of a computer or network and filters the traffic based on some predefined rules. The firewall rules are set by an administrator. For example, a firewall can filter traffic based on source IP address, port number, certain protocols used, etc. A web application firewall can also filter traffic based on which application protocol is used. You can get more information on what a firewall is and how it works here: https://www.thesecuritybuddy.com/firewall/what-is-a-firewall/
